com.ibm.team.repository.client

Interface ITeamRepositoryService.IRepositoryServiceListener

  • Enclosing interface:
    ITeamRepositoryService

    public static interface ITeamRepositoryService.IRepositoryServiceListener
    Listener interface used to listen to repository additions and removals from the team repository service. Example usage: 
     // register a team repository listener
 ITeamRepositoryService.IRepositoryServiceListener listener = new ITeamRepositoryService.IRepositoryServiceListener() {
     public void addedRepository(ITeamRepository repository) {
         // add code to handle repository adds
     }
 
     public void removedRepository(ITeamRepository repository) {
         // add code to handle repository removes
     }
 };
 TeamPlatform.getTeamRepositoryService().registerRepositoryServiceListener(
         listener);
 
 // deregister the team repository listener
 TeamPlatform.getTeamRepositoryService().removeRepositoryServiceListener(
         listener);

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addedRepository(ITeamRepository repository)
      To be implemented by listener implementations and called by platform whenever a new repository instance is created and added to the repository service pool.
      void removedRepository(ITeamRepository repository)
      To be implemented by listener implementations and called by the platform whenever a repository instance is removed from the repository service pool.

    • Method Detail

      • addedRepository

        void addedRepository(ITeamRepository repository)
        To be implemented by listener implementations and called by platform whenever a new repository instance is created and added to the repository service pool. Creating an unmanaged team repository does not generated an event.
        Parameters:
        repository - the newly created repository instance; never null

      • removedRepository

        void removedRepository(ITeamRepository repository)
        To be implemented by listener implementations and called by the platform whenever a repository instance is removed from the repository service pool.
        Parameters:
        repository - the removed repository instance; never null
